coding.title: Petiary

coding.title: Manga Project
coding.about: The project consists of a backend, frontend and a simple Android application written in Kotlin. The project is created on demand of a friend of mine. The website is using Python, Django and React. I tried different deployment options for backend and frontend parts but then I decided on Amazon S3 Bucket, Postgresql DB and Vercel for backend and frontend themselves.

coding.title: Binary Leaves Classification
coding.about: Developed a leaf classification system using binary image processing techniques, combining handcrafted features and machine learning for accurate multi-class recognition.
